Package com.linecorp.armeria.common.logging

Interface ContentPreviewer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContentPreviewerAdapter
    public interface ContentPreviewer
    Produces the preview of RequestLog.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static ContentPreviewer disabled()
      A dummy ContentPreviewer which discards everything it collected and produces null.
      boolean isDone()
      Determines if the previewer has been ready to produce the preview or the preview has been already produced.
      static ContentPreviewer ofBinary​(int length, BiFunction<? super HttpHeaders,​? super ByteBuf,​String> reproducer)
      Creates a new instance of ContentPreviewer which produces the preview through reproducer when the contents have been aggregated more than length bytes.
      static ContentPreviewer ofBinary​(int length, Function<? super ByteBuf,​String> reproducer)
      Creates a new instance of ContentPreviewer which produces the preview through reproducer when the contents have been aggregated more than length bytes.
      static ContentPreviewer ofText​(int length)
      Creates a new instance of ContentPreviewer which produces the text with the maximum length limit.
      static ContentPreviewer ofText​(int length, Charset defaultCharset)
      Creates a new instance of ContentPreviewer which produces the text with the maximum length limit.
      void onData​(HttpData data)
      Invoked after request/response data is received.
      void onHeaders​(HttpHeaders headers)
      Invoked after request/response headers is received.
      String produce()
      Produces the preview of RequestLog.

    • Method Detail

      • ofBinary

        static ContentPreviewer ofBinary​(int length,
                                 Function<? super ByteBuf,​String> reproducer)
        Creates a new instance of ContentPreviewer which produces the preview through reproducer when the contents have been aggregated more than length bytes.

      • ofBinary

        static ContentPreviewer ofBinary​(int length,
                                 BiFunction<? super HttpHeaders,​? super ByteBuf,​String> reproducer)
        Creates a new instance of ContentPreviewer which produces the preview through reproducer when the contents have been aggregated more than length bytes.

      • ofText

        static ContentPreviewer ofText​(int length,
                               Charset defaultCharset)
        Creates a new instance of ContentPreviewer which produces the text with the maximum length limit.
        Parameters:
        length - the maximum length of the preview
        defaultCharset - the default charset used when a charset is not specified in the "content-type" header

      • ofText

        static ContentPreviewer ofText​(int length)
        Creates a new instance of ContentPreviewer which produces the text with the maximum length limit.
        Parameters:
        length - the maximum length of the preview.

      • disabled

        static ContentPreviewer disabled()
        A dummy ContentPreviewer which discards everything it collected and produces null.

      • onHeaders

        void onHeaders​(HttpHeaders headers)
        Invoked after request/response headers is received.

      • onData

        void onData​(HttpData data)
        Invoked after request/response data is received. Note that it is not invoked when the request/response is completed or isDone() returns true even if a new content is received.

      • produce

        @Nullable
String produce()
        Produces the preview of RequestLog. Note that it is invoked when the request or response is ended or the preview has been ready to be produced.
        Returns:
        the preview, or null if disabled.

      • isDone

        boolean isDone()
        Determines if the previewer has been ready to produce the preview or the preview has been already produced.
